document_data.caption: A complete hinge-removing set.
document_data.name: Hinge-removing Set
document_data.mainbody: '''Hinge-removing sets''' were a type of tool in the Realms used to remove hinges from doors or sealed containers.
document_data.Description: These sets contained a variety of small metal tools used for various applications.
document_data.History: A set of these items were available for purchase through ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue (in-universe)|Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'' for 30 [[gold piece]]s.
document_data.Notable Users: * Hinge-removing sets were favored by [[thieves]] or [[rogues]] who were unable to pick the lock on a door.
